author.author: Guru Arjan Dev
author.description:
Guru Arjan Dev [1563 - 1606] was the fifth Guru of the Sikhs, born at Goindval. He was the youngest of the three sons of Guru Ram Das, the fourth Sikh Guru.

Guru Arjan Dev finished the construction of the Harimandir Sahib, the Golden Temple, and compiled the first Sikh scripture, known as the Adi Granth. Shortly after he became the first martyr of the Sikh religion, which formed a turning point in the development of the faith.

translation.text: Your servant prays to You, O Lord and Master. ||3||

melody.description: Gauri Guarairi contains a mixture of calmness and control in feeling, however the emotional message of the Raag is open and truthful in its approach. The emotions are conveyed in a direct and disciplined way. The balanced and focused character of this Raag is evident in its structure, in that its scale is restricted to ‘madh saptak’ (middle scale).

author.author: Guru Arjan Dev
author.description:
Guru Arjan Dev [1563 - 1606] was the fifth Guru of the Sikhs, born at Goindval. He was the youngest of the three sons of Guru Ram Das, the fourth Sikh Guru.

Guru Arjan Dev finished the construction of the Harimandir Sahib, the Golden Temple, and compiled the first Sikh scripture, known as the Adi Granth. Shortly after he became the first martyr of the Sikh religion, which formed a turning point in the development of the faith.

text: ਮਨੁ ਤਨੁ ਨਿਰਮਲੁ ਹੋਇ ਹਰਿ ਰੰਗਿ ॥

translation.text: The mind and body become immaculate through the Lord's Love.

transliteration.text: man tan niramal hōi har rang .

melody.description: Gauri Guarairi contains a mixture of calmness and control in feeling, however the emotional message of the Raag is open and truthful in its approach. The emotions are conveyed in a direct and disciplined way. The balanced and focused character of this Raag is evident in its structure, in that its scale is restricted to ‘madh saptak’ (middle scale).

translation.text: All peace is found in the Sat Sangat, the True Congregation.

melody.description: Gauri Guarairi contains a mixture of calmness and control in feeling, however the emotional message of the Raag is open and truthful in its approach. text: ਹਰਿ ਰਸ ਕਾ ਤੂੰ ਚਾਖਹਿ ਸਾਦੁ ॥

translation.text: But when you taste the sweet flavor the the Lord's sublime essence

transliteration.text: har ras kā tūn chākhah sād .

melody.description: Gauri Guarairi contains a mixture of calmness and control in feeling, however the emotional message of the Raag is open and truthful in its approach. The emotions are conveyed in a direct and disciplined way. translation.text: - upon tasting it, you shall be wonder-struck and amazed. ||1||

translation.text: O dear beloved tongue, drink in the Ambrosial Nectar.

text: ਇਹ ਰਸ ਰਾਤੀ ਹੋਇ ਤ੍ਰਿਪਤਾਰੀ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥

translation.text: Imbued with this sublime essence, you shall be satisfied. ||1||Pause||

transliteration.text: ih ras rātī hōi tripatārī .1. rahāu .

melody.description: Gauri Guarairi contains a mixture of calmness and control in feeling, however the emotional message of the Raag is open and truthful in its approach. text: ਹੇ ਜਿਹਵੇ ਤੂੰ ਰਾਮ ਗੁਣ ਗਾਉ ॥

translation.text: O tongue, sing the Glorious Praises of the Lord.

transliteration.text: hē jihavē tūn rām gun gāu .

melody.description: Gauri Guarairi contains a mixture of calmness and control in feeling, however the emotional message of the Raag is open and truthful in its approach. text: ਨਿਮਖ ਨਿਮਖ ਹਰਿ ਹਰਿ ਹਰਿ ਧਿਆਉ ॥

translation.text: Each and every moment, meditate on the Lord, Har, Har, Har.

transliteration.text: nimakh nimakh har har har dhiāu .

melody.description: Gauri Guarairi contains a mixture of calmness and control in feeling, however the emotional message of the Raag is open and truthful in its approach. translation.text: Do not listen to any other, and do not go anywhere else.

text: ਆਠ ਪਹਰ ਜਿਹਵੇ ਆਰਾਧਿ ॥ ਪਾਰਬ੍ਰਹਮ ਠਾਕੁਰ ਆਗਾਧਿ ॥

translation.text: Twenty-four hours a day, O tongue, dwell upon God, the Unfathomable, Supreme Lord and Master.

transliteration.text: āth pahar jihavē ārādh . pārabraham thākur āgādh .

melody.description: Gauri Guarairi contains a mixture of calmness and control in feeling, however the emotional message of the Raag is open and truthful in its approach. translation.text: Chanting the Glorious Praises of the Lord, O tongue, you shall become priceless. ||3||

text: ਇਹ ਰਸ ਰਾਤੀ ਬਹੁਰਿ ਨ ਛੋਡੇ ॥

text: ਆਨ ਨ ਰਸ ਕਸ ਲਵੈ ਨ ਲਾਈ ॥

translation.text: No other sweet and tasty flavors can compare to it.

text: ਕਹੁ ਨਾਨਕ ਗੁਰ ਭਏ ਹੈ ਸਹਾਈ ॥੪॥੧੫॥੮੪॥

translation.text: Says Nanak, the Guru has become my Support. ||4||15||84||

transliteration.text: kah nānak gur bhaē hai sahāī .4.15.84.
